body_html:
I gave it a try to enable kms support with s3, but got the following:

Range-Get Operations are not allowed with Strict Authenticated Encryption mode.

Not very familiar with AWS kms though. So I am wondering if it is possible to have range get with encryption at the the moment.
body_text:
I gave it a try to enable kms support with s3, but got the following:
Range-Get Operations are not allowed with Strict Authenticated Encryption mode.

Not very familiar with AWS kms though. So I am wondering if it is possible to have range get with encryption at the the moment.
body:
I gave it a try to enable kms support with s3, but got the following:
```
Range-Get Operations are not allowed with Strict Authenticated Encryption mode.
```
Not very familiar with AWS kms though. So I am wondering if it is possible to have range get with encryption at the the moment.
